actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: Authorizing and requesting the President to proclaim 1971 and the years leading up to and through the bicentennial year 1976 as a period to discover America, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the President to proclaim 1971 and the years leading up to and through the bicentennial year 1976 as a period to discover America. Authorizes the President to appoint a national chairman, who will serve without compensation from the Federal Government, to coordinate the efforts of private industry in carrying out the purpose of this Act.

titles.title: Authorizing and requesting the President to proclaim 1971 and the years leading up to and through the bicentennial year 1976 as a period to discover America, and for other purposes.
